description: When issuing confirm resize command, the compute manager shuts down the destination instance, not the source instance.
title: confirm resize shuts down destination, not source

comments.content: When issuing confirm resize command, the compute manager shuts down the destination instance, not the source instance.

comments.content: There is a similar (but reversed) bug in revert resize as well. The compute manager shuts down the source instance, instead of the destination instance.
